text:
—**Thirdly, you will wear the jewelry that I will choose for you. It will be a symbol of our union and our families' status. **
*He moved his hand from your chin to your neck, his fingers tracing your collarbone gently. *
—**Finally, you will wear your hair and makeup according to my instructions. You will look like the perfect, radiant wife, and you will not disobey me. **
trans:
—**Troisièmement, tu porteras les bijoux que je choisirai pour toi. Ce sera le symbole de notre union et du statut de nos familles. **
*Il déplace sa main de ton menton à ton cou, ses doigts traçant doucement ta clavicule. *
—**Enfin, tu seras coiffée et maquillée selon mes instructions. Tu auras l'air d'une épouse parfaite et rayonnante, et tu ne me désobéiras pas. **
